distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
pcsc-lite was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2016-10109: This use-after-free and double-free issue allowed local attacker to cause a Denial of Service and possible privilege escalation (bsc#1017902).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Use-after-free vulnerability in pcsc-lite before 1.8.20 allows a remote attackers to cause denial of service (crash) via a command that uses "cardsList" after the handle has been released through the SCardReleaseContext function.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
